net.sf.wubiq.utils

Class InstallerProperties

  • java.lang.Object
    • BaseProperties
      • net.sf.wubiq.utils.InstallerProperties

  • public class InstallerProperties
extends BaseProperties
    Collects the value from wubiq-client.properties. This file search is as followed. It is first searched in the folder in the system file where the client is run. If not found then it is look up in the default paths of java class paths.
    Author:
    Federico Alcantara
